shortdef: lying, occurring, or functioning within the limiting boundaries : inner
belonging to mental or spiritual life
belonging to the inner constitution or concealed nature of something

dt: {bc}the interior part (as of a country or island)

shortdef: the inner or spiritual nature : character
the interior part (as of a country or island)
the internal or inner part of a thing : inside

dt: {bc}the inner of the two angles formed where two sides of a polygon come together

dt: {bc}the art or practice of planning and supervising the design and execution of architectural interiors and their furnishings

dt: {bc}a door inside a building {bc}a door that connects rooms

dt: {bc}one of a pair of angles with different vertices and on opposite sides of a transversal at its intersection with two other lines:
{bc}one of a pair of angles inside the two intersected lines

art.capt: alternate interior angles {it}a, a′, b, b′{/it}; alternate exterior angles {it}c, c′, d, d′{/it}
